fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the cluster resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

fields.name: DatastoreId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the datastore resource on which the data for the virtual machine will be kept.

fields.name: HostId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the host resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.

fields.name: ResourcePoolId
fields.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the resourcePool resource on which this virtual machine will deploy.
